DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the X axis.

DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the Y axis. If not given, the value from _VoxelSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the Z axis. If not given, the value from _VoxelSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfVoxelsX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Number of voxels along the X axis.

DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfVoxelsY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Number of voxels along the Y axis. If not given, the value from _NumberOfVoxelsX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: NumberOfVoxelsZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: NumberOf voxels along the Z axis. If not given, the value from _NumberOfVoxelsX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: Voxels
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of voxels on the grid. The array is one-dimensional where values are distributed in the following order: along X, then Y and finally Z.
